attributes.action: Increase SSP to National Minimum Wage time o because Covid19 self isolation.
attributes.additional_details: People who need to self isolate who have SSP rather than company sick pay are likely to be in low paid work without savings to act as a ‘buffer’. Increasing SSP would mean people who are symptomatic would be more likely to follow advice because they could afford to still pay rent/bills/buy medication etc. The money would go back into the economy and would prevent hardship at a time of crisis.
attributes.background: To review SSP to increase this to National Minimum Wage for a period of time whilst there is the current health crisis. For the government to release funds to implement this.
